Mary Charlotte Crawford

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Lottie
  2. Foster Name: Mary Caroline Woolsey
  3. Foster Family: William and Hannah Woolsey
  4. Location of Family: Beatrice, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Home of the Friendless
  6. Arrival Place: Unknown
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: 1874, PA
  9. Date of Death: 1903-03-31, Champion, NE
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Mary Swiger
  12. Spouse Name: M. A. Swiger
  13. Source: Beatrice Daily Sun, 3 April 1903; Find-a-Grave; 1880 United States Federal Census; 1900 United States Federal Census; OTR, 467.
